commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: And a big reason for that Oilers turnaround has been the play of Connor McDavid, who's just electric out there.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: Absolutely. He's a game-changer. But Florida's got some firepower of their own. Keep an eye on Matthew Tkachuk tonight.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: Tkachuk loves to get under your skin, and he's got the skill to back it up. That's a dangerous combination.
